text: His Brother's Wife is a 1936 American romantic drama movie directed by W. S. Van Dyke and starring Robert Taylor, Barbara Stanwyck, Jean Hersholt, Joseph Calleia, John Eldredge, Jed Prouty, Leonard Mudie. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by W. S. Van Dyke Category:MGM movies
title: His Brother's Wife
